p: The MEDLINE (PubMed) and Google scholar search machines were used as source of the peer-reviewed articles included in this review. The articles were selected using keywords combined by Boolean operators (peste des petits ruminants OR PPR OR Peste des petits ruminants virus OR PPRV OR diagnosis OR diagnostic*AND (PPR diagnosis). All searches on PPR diagnosis were performed in 2 years. Only 142 articles out of 4782 written in English from the first description of PPR in 1942 met inclusion criteria as shown in PRISMA flow diagram (Fig. 1).
